Translations.Text: Tomara ya bhalobasa ta theke byaya na kara paryanta tomara kakhano sa'oyaba arjana karabe na. Ara tomara ya kichu byaya kara, niscaya allaha se samparke sabisesa abagata

Ta'orata nayila ha'oyara age is‌ra'ila tara nijera upara ya harama karechila [1] ta chara bani isara'ilera jan'ya yabatiya khadya'i halala chila [2]. Baluna, ‘yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o tabe ta'orata ana ebam ta patha kara.’
Erapara'o yara allah‌ra upara mithya ratana kare tara'i yalema
Baluna, ‘allah‌ satya balechena. Kaje'i tomara ekanisthabhabe ib‌rahimera millata anusarana kara, ara tini musarikadera antarbhukta chilena na.’
Niscaya manaba jatira [‌1] jan'ya sarbaprathama [2] ye ghara pratisthita hayechila ta to bakkaya, barakatamaya o srstijagatera disari hisabe

Tate aneka suspasta nidarsana ache [1], yemana makame ibarahima [2]. Ara ye ke'u sekhane prabesa kare se nirapada [3]. Ara manusera madhye yara sekhane ya'oyara samarthya ache, allah‌ra uddesye ai gharera hajba [4] kara tara jan'ya abasya kartabya [5]. Ara ye ke'u kuphari karala se jene rakhuka, niscaya allaha srstijagatera mukhapeksi nana
Baluna, ‘he ahale kitabagana! Tomara allah‌ra nidarsanasamuhera sathe kena kuphari kara? Ara tomara ya kara allaha tara saksi’

Baluna, ‘he ahale kitabagana! Ye byakti imana eneche take kena allah‌ra pathe badha diccha, tate bakrata anbesana kare? Athaca tomara saksi [1]. Ara tomara ya kara, allah‌ se samparke anabahita nana.’
He muminagana! Yaderake kitaba deya hayeche, tomara yadi tadera dala bisesera anugatya kara, tabe tara tomaderake imana anara para abara kaphera baniye charabe
